title: Fort Sumter National Monument: Contact Public Affairs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Contact Public Affairs              Contact Public Affairs      Media requests should be directed to the Public Information Officer: Dawn Davis (843) 883-3123 x 213 (843) 883-3910 fax E-mail If you have an urgent media request and the PIO is not available, please contact the Superintendent's office at (843) 883-3123 x 210.
